FuncDef: This command configures the keepalive timer override. The PIM (S,G) Keepalive Timer (KAT) is used to maintain the (S,G) state when (S,G) join is not received. Expiry of the KAT causes the (S,G) entry to be removed.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the keepalive timer override, in seconds. Values-10 to 300.
